inclusion.criterion: Previously untreated or relapsed locally advanced or metastatic transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No known central nervous system metastasis.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He also has lab results showing elevated creatinine and BUN levels.
